JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Unskilled or skilled mechanical assembly employee on evening shift
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Our partner is looking for unskilled or skilled production employee to join an international team driven by finding the best customer solutions

Your role:

As new production employee, you will be assigned to the forging team, where you will get to work with a wide range of tasks within assembly and hard soldiering of mechanical parts and pipes on refrigeration systems and heat pumps. You will be a part of a team with strong collaboration but you will also get to work closely with colleagues across the production department, where you will be a part of ensuring the strong quality of our products.

Tasks include:

  • Bending and adapting copper pipes
  • Solder copper/copper and copper/steel
  • Build facilities according to 3D working drawings
  • Help improve our facilities and work processes
Who are you?

You can be either unskilled or skilled. You might have a background as blacksmith, boilermaker, plumber or similar. More importantly, you can read technical documentation, including assembly drawing, want to learn, and contribute to ensuring the high quality of our products. Corporate language is English, so you need to be able to communicate in English.

We offer

As an employee of our customer, you will get to work with more than 320 competent colleagues of more than 35 different nationalities and join in their mission to design and produce the world’s best sustainable climate solutions. You will become part of a highly ambitious company that values a good working environment, diversity, teamwork, and prioritizes the employees’ well-being and safety, and therefore, not being afraid of investing in new technologies to improve working conditions. You will join on the evening shift (monday to thursday from 14:00-23:00), however the training will be on the day shift for the first 4 weeks. In addition, you will have the possibility to join the fitness center and a delicious canteen. You will get health insurance, while your salary is agreed based on your qualifications. The location is in Brabrand, close to E45 and with bus stops nearby, enabling easy access.

Interested?

If this sounds like the job for you, please submit your CV and application electronically via the link.

You are welcome to write your application in either Danish or English.

OBS: applications send on e-mail will be not accepted!
